channel.title: Few things
channel.description:
1.How can i change the items in a shop?
2.how do i change the "home"? and all the toher places.
3.if i want to add a command will it matter if i put the command all the way down the bottom of client.java? or will i have to put it with all the rest???
Thx guys.

item.title: Few things
item.dc:creator: @johnn272 johnn272
item.description:

{
SendMessage(Hope you like “stuff”)
addItem(747, 1):
}
if (command.equalsignorcase(" THen other stuff…

Would it go like that??? for the commands?

item.title: Few things
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

okay in shop.cfg look for the item u wanna change/remove or find the shop ur looking for by searching for the items, in shops file it shows like htis

shop = SHOP-ID sell type buy type item1 amt-of-itm1 item2 amt-of-itm2

and so on like this perhaps

shop = 1 2 2 4151 1 1050 1

that wuld b a whip and santa, so just look 4 the shop ur wanting 2 change around, etc etc…

next!
look for the home’s coords in client.java/player.java/playerhandler.java and chnage to the new coords u want

search for if (command.startswith(“home”)

and add ur command around that area, amke it look like it fits in lol like

if (command.startsWith(“rawr”) {
setAnimation(747);
}

and so on, easier 2 understand now?
